name: The Hero Business
description:
You live in a dangerous time - monsters inhabit uncountable lairs throughout the land. There's money to be made off treasure inside, but why do the dirty work? Instead, exploi- uh equip wandering adventurers with the best stuff around! Make sure they have the tools to defeat the dungeon, of course, but also entertain their whims and appease their egos to negotiate the best deal. Will you be a hero tycoon?

The heroes, dungeons, adventuring parties, and enquipment are all randomized each time you play!

This game is controlled with the mouse.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
